title: Between the Scenes - Donald Trump's Post-Truth Defenders and the Smearing of Alexander Vindman
itunes:title: Between the Scenes - Donald Trump's Post-Truth Defenders and the Smearing of Alexander Vindman
description:
Trevor argues that President Trump's defenders are trying to destroy the notion of objective truth and breaks down the wild conspiracy theory about Lt. Col. Alexander Vindman.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
